titles.title: State Regulation of Marriage Is Appropriate Act
To amend title 1, United States Code, to eliminate any Federal policy on the definition of marriage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

bill.summary: 7/9/2003--Introduced. State Regulation of Marriage Is Appropriate Act - Amends Federal law to repeal the statutory definition of "marriage" as meaning only a legal union between one man and one woman as husband and wife, and of "spouse" as referring only to a person of the opposite sex who is a husband or a wife.
